entry.title: Young Justice Can Have a Little Evil As a Treat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,803Chapters: 20/35Kudos: 1,021

Summary: Tim snorts, “Right. Obviously, that’s not the full story, but you were in space so we’re good.” He activates the tablet and shows Hal familiar paperwork. “I’ve come to the conclusion that if the League is going to treat me like I’m an unstable rogue, they’re going to have to commit to the bit.”After being treated like unwanted children all their lives, Tim, Kon, Cassie, and Bart start to realise that the adulthood set out before them isn't much better than the past their leaving behind. They decide it's time to make their own way in the world, even if it means being labelled as 'evil'

entry.title: Chained: To Wield the Blade we have Forged
entry.summary:
Author: Tinerian

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 165,787Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 408

Summary: Now bound together as Master and Submissed, Tim and Jason have nearly omnipotent levels of dangerously unpredictable power at their fingertips. Anyone finding out they hold this power could unravel everything, but the web of lies and secrets they're spinning could destroy them just as easily, and the threat of whatever impending doom prompted the Contract to be made in the first place hangs over their heads like the sword of Damacles.When you hold power over all life and death, how do you decide who not to save?If power is the great corrupter, is it possible for a God to be good?If you put a man in prison for life, would it have been more honest and merciful to slay him with your own two hands?Is a fundamentally evil universe worth preserving?These are the questions that will haunt them, but so too will they be haunted by their love for each other, the wonderful absurdity of joy, goofy ass happenstance, friendship, and lots of playful bickering.Join Tim and Jason on their journey to becoming the ultimate problematic 24/7 BDSM power couple!Estimated final word count: 500,000+

entry.title: Like a Songbird in the Ocean
entry.summary:
Author: squid_king

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,349Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 860

Summary: Batman and his ilk were notoriously, fastidiously, pathologically private people.It was a well known fact, practically a law of the universe.Which was why Conner was having an incredibly difficult time with the request being made of him."Sorry, you want me to what?" Conner's disbelief was potent enough to overrule his well-learned fear of Batman almost entirely."Red Robin is in a compromised state." Batman's tone was as stony as ever, his form looming and intimidating as he spoke to Conner. "He has . . . made it clear to me that you are his . . . preferred avenue of rectifying the situation." Or; Red Robin gets dosed with sex pollen and asks Batman to ask Conner to help him out ;)

entry.title: i'll never be the one that got away
entry.summary:
Author: dickweed7

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,253Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 213

Summary: “I said, go away,” Tim repeated, his voice strained and quiet under the steam and noise. Kon sighed, placing the shampoo on the counter with a soft thud. “At least turn the water down, it’s going to scald you,” he called out. Tim ripped the shower curtain back to glare at him. He was sitting curled up on the tiled floor of the tub, fully dressed in a thick, too-large t-shirt that Kon was almost certain was his. Based on the murderous look Tim was giving him, he was not about to ask. “Leave, Kon,” he repeated, his voice cutting through the noise. “Baby—” Kon tried, stepping closer when he saw the glint of tears rolling down Tim’s face. “Kon-El.” That was the nuclear option. Kon-El was reserved for life-or-death situations, a reprimand, or the most serious possible boundary. Kon didn't hesitate. He slowly backed out of the bathroom, pulling the door shut until the click of the latch was deafeningly loud. Yeah. Kon had no idea what to do. -- or, in which Tim gets his period and Kon does his best to help.

entry.title: I like the way you curse my name.
entry.summary:
Author: dickweed7

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,136Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 219

Summary: That’s when Tim listened a little closer, isolating a quick, shallow stutter in Kon’s breathing, and then the muffled sound of fabric scrunching. “Kon, are you jerking off right now?” That earned him a low groan. “Y-yeah,” He said, the word coming out a little strangled. “Was doing it when you called, thought I’d just finish up really quick, but you know me too well, huh?” He said. Tim’s face flushed hot, suddenly feeling the damp, unbearable friction in his boxers. “What? You couldn’t wait until tomorrow?” Tim asked, a slight cockiness in his tone. “Baby, I’ve been suffering without you,” Kon said. --- or in which, supers were banned from the Wayne manor for a month and Tim and Kon are too horny for that.
